reviewText:
You have a wonderful choice.

Don't wait for this DVD to come back in stock. Instead, search for the 10-DVD collection for less than $10 here on Amazon:

. . . . . . LOVE COMES SOFTLY: 10th ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION
. . . . . . (see picture - 10 movies - 10th Anniv. - less than $10)

You can see my longer review there, and many other FIVE-STAR reviews there.

Get the ten DVD set. You'll be glad you did.
